subject: Biology
question_text: A man decides to do some fitness training to improve his ability to provide oxygen to his muscles.

difficulty.justification: Combines understanding of respiratory system and exercise physiology

sub_questions.text: Describe the route an oxygen molecule takes from the atmosphere to reach the muscles.
Suggest two body changes that would improve his ability to provide oxygen to his muscles.
State the name of the chemical process that uses oxygen to release energy in the muscles.
Use the graph to determine the maximum volume of oxygen the man consumes in one minute.
Explain why he can only increase exercise intensity beyond maximum oxygen consumption for a short period.
Sketch a line to show the expected results of successful fitness training.
